title: Simple Profile Card
description: Create a basic profile card with an image, name, and description. Use the provided avatar image in your design.
instructions:
Build a profile card containing:
- Profile image (use: /assets/images/avatar-1.png)
- Name heading: 'John Doe'
- Role text: 'Web Developer'
- Short bio paragraph
- Centered layout
- Width: 300px
- White background with shadow
- Border radius: 15px
hints: Use tag for the profile picture
Center elements with text-align or flexbox

John Doe

Web Developer

Passionate about creating beautiful and functional websites.

- Use provided icon images for buttons

title: Contact Form with Validation
description: Build a complete contact form with client-side validation and styled error messages.
instructions:
Create a contact form with:
- Name, email, and message fields
- Submit button
- Validate: name (not empty), email (valid format), message (min 10 chars)
- Show error messages in red below fields
- Success message on valid submission
- Use provided form icon
hints: Use event.preventDefault() to stop form submission
Check email with regex or includes('@')

expectedSolution.html: Contact Us

title: Build a Simple Product Card
description: Design a single product card with a product image, name, description, and price. (/assets/courses/fullstack-thumb.png)
instructions:
Detailed step-by-step instructions:
- Step 1: Create a container div with class 'product-card'.
- Step 2: Inside it, add an image, product name (h2), short description (p), and a price (span).
- Step 3: Use CSS to add a border, shadow, and padding.
- Step 4: Center the card and ensure it looks good visually.
- Step 5: Keep the width around 300px for pixel match consistency.
hints: Hint 1: Use box-shadow for card effect

expectedSolution.html:
Wireless Headphones

High-quality wireless sound with long battery life.

$59.99

title: Design a Navigation Bar
description: Create a horizontal navigation bar with links like Home, About, and Contact. (/assets/courses/fullstack-thumb.png)
instructions:
Detailed step-by-step instructions:
- Step 1: Use a <nav> element with <ul> and <li> tags for menu items.
- Step 2: Add anchor (<a>) tags inside each <li>.
- Step 3: Style the nav with background color, horizontal layout using flex or inline-block.
- Step 4: Add hover effect on links.
- Step 5: Keep spacing and alignment pixel-perfect.
hints: Hint 1: Use display: flex or inline-block for list items

expectedSolution.html:
• Home
  • About
  • Contact

title: Create a Two-Column Layout
description: Build a responsive two-column layout using HTML and CSS. (/assets/courses/fullstack-thumb.png)
instructions:
Detailed step-by-step instructions:
- Step 1: Create a container div with two child divs: 'left' and 'right'.
- Step 2: Add text or placeholders in both sections.
- Step 3: Use CSS Flexbox to arrange them side by side.
- Step 4: Add border and padding to each column.
- Step 5: Ensure it becomes a single column on small screens.

expectedSolution.html:
Left Column Content
Right Column Content

title: Build a Simple Contact Form
description: Create a contact form with input fields for name, email, and message, and a submit button. (/assets/courses/fullstack-thumb.png)
instructions:
Detailed step-by-step instructions:
- Step 1: Create a <form> element with name, email, and message fields.
- Step 2: Use <input> and <textarea> elements properly labeled.
- Step 3: Add a submit button.
- Step 4: Use CSS to style inputs with padding, border-radius, and spacing.
- Step 5: Center the form on the page and limit its width to 400px.
hints: Hint 2: Use display: block for inputs
Hint 3: Add hover effect for button
